meanings.definition: A course or seminar that serves as an introduction to a subject or field of study.
meanings.sent1: The proseminar on biology helped students understand the basics.
meanings.sent2: I attended the proseminar on literature before starting my degree.
meanings.sent3: The proseminar on painting was like a warm-up before the main event.
meanings.sent4: Her proseminar on history laid the foundation for further learning.
meanings.sent5: The proseminar on astronomy made the stars seem closer than ever before.

meanings.definition: A meeting or class that precedes a more advanced seminar or course.
meanings.sent1: Before the advanced seminar, we had a helpful proseminar to prepare.
meanings.sent2: The proseminar was a great way to ease into the complex material.
meanings.sent3: The proseminar felt like a sneak peek into the world of advanced studies.
meanings.sent4: Attending the proseminar was like getting a preview of what was to come.
meanings.sent5: The proseminar set the stage for deeper exploration in the upcoming seminar.
